caption: This photograph depicts an industrial scene characterized by multiple smokestacks emitting thick, dark smoke against a blue sky. The foreground is shaded, hinting at a late afternoon or evening time, which darkens the details of the industrial structures below. There are flags visible, suggesting some form of operational facility, likely a factory or plant, emphasized by the robust industrial activity evident from the smoke. Visible in the background, beyond the smokestacks, is a large spherical structure, possibly a storage tank or gas holder, partially illuminated by ambient sunlight. The composition strongly focuses on environmental impact, contrasting the dark smoke and industrial setting against a relatively clear sky.
title: Ford foundry in brook park, just outside Cleveland
